level.heading: Collection of tax; liens; jeopardy assessments; distraint.
Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 4-131, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-2001.

level.heading: Miscellaneous Notes
level.text: Office of Collector of Taxes abolished: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-401.

Section 410(e) of D.C. Law 13-305 provides: "Section 406(b), (d), (f), (l), (n), (o), (r), (v), (x) through (aa), (cc), (ff), (gg), (ll), (pp), (vv), (ww), (aaa), (ccc), (eee), and (ggg) shall apply as of January 1, 2001."
